headline: CooperCompanies Appoints Barbara Carbone to Board of Directors
summary: SAN RAMON, Calif., April 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CooperCompanies (Nasdaq: COO), a leading global medical device company, announced today that its Board of Directors has appointed Barbara Carbone as an independent director, effective May 1, 2025. Ms. Carbone has also been appointed to serve on the Audit Committee when she joins the Board. Ms. Carbone brings nearly four decades of experience across a wide variety of industries. She spent most of her career at KPMG LLP, from 1981-2019, where s
